www.vitaminDwiki.com 30000 research papers. The coronavirus is another enveloped virus
Vitamin D inhibit most enveloped virus

Image

Vitamin D can inhibit enveloped virus (e.g. Herpes, Zoster, Epstein, Hepatitis, Ebola) – March 2011
Also: cytomegalovirus, retrovirus - like HIV, Dengue, Yellow fever. Measles, Mumps, smallpox
Virus classification include Coronavirus
The interplay between vitamin D and viral infections – Jan 2019
Dengue fever - 8X higher risk for getting worse if low vitamin D – Sept 2017

Update Jan 27, 2020
Coronavirus outbreak in China is an opportunity to test Vitamin D:

Many people having a disease in one location
New hospitals being build in a week will most likely be open to new ideas
Expect that they will be very anxious to find solutions which work
I propose giving Vitamin D to some of the infected in Chinese hospitals
unsure of dose size: Might need as much as 800,000 IU or as little as 50,000 IU
that is, need between 1 and 16 "Vitamin D Hammers" (50,000 IU each)
Want to test/prove that Vitamin D can fight yet another enveloped virus
Should be able to see if Vitamin D provides a significant benefit within a week
If there is a benefit, it can be quickly extended to

All Coronavirus patients in hospitals,
Coronavirus patients who could not get into hospitals
People who feel that they may have been infected
Hospital staff, police
City, country

Perspective: Unsure of Coronavirus virulence

SARS 800 deaths – Coronavirus appears to have a 3X lower death rate
Thus far fewer than 100 Chinese deaths.
As of Jan 26 official infection statistics is 2,200 Chinese
Hong King University researchers say that 44,000 have actually been infected. some of whom are not yet showing symptoms
Influenza: 500,000 deaths per year around the world
1918 Spanish flu – 40 million deaths in 2 years
Possibly there can be an Epidemic in China

Most Chinese have very low levels of vitamin D
The" quarantine" (which should have been called a travel restriction)
allowed 5 million to leave – thus allowing the virus to spread in China
Note: People can be infected, become infectious, and not be detected as having a fever for many days
during which time they could have traveled anywhere in the world.
Note: An enveloped virus, similar to the Rhinovirus (common cold). can apparently remain alive on surfaces for 5 days

It seems unlikely that will become a Pandemic into those countries having 2X to 3X higher levels of vitamin D.
Note: As of Jan 27 there have been ZERO deaths outside of China.
Note: The Middle East has an even lower level of Vitamin D than China
China should be worried, the rest of the world – not so much

possible to become an Epidemic, unlikely to become a Pandemic
Vitamin D solution might be augmented by some combination of the following

Vitamin C, Quercertin, Zinc, – all of which quickly improve immune systems
UV-C air purification – which reduces infection of others in the room and re-infection
Inhaled Vitamin D – likely to provide prevention, unknown if it will provide treatment
room humidifier with vitamin D emulsion - likely prevention, unknown treatment
Vitamin D cream – faster than oral Vitamin D, gut-friendly, and no pills to swallow, but is 10X more expensive

However: This is a novel virus, so there is virtually no immune system pre-existing experience to work with.
So the immune system needs to be as good as it can be.
Unsure if Vitamin D will be enough for a novel virus

The number of reported cases is likely to be extremely under-reported because in mild to moderate cases it is just assumed to be a normal flu. OTOH, deaths from tested and verified Corona virus is likely to be much more accurate. This could easily mean that the mortality rate is much lower than is feared. That is a good thing because it would mean that Corona virus is much less deadly than some are fearing. It might not even be dramatically more deadly than a normal flu.
There are definitely geopolitical factors involved here that could be swaying the reporting accuracy of these numbers. And interestingly, there are political reasons why China could actually be exaggerating the danger (or at least not suppressing it). The Chinese gov't is in a very tough position right now, not just locally, but globally. They have an enormous need to justify their existence, value, and moral authority. Just one example - look at how they are making such a media circus over the ultra-fast construction of this new hospital and providing a live stream. This is not the action of a regime who is trying to downplay the seriousness of this event. For the Chinese gov't, this could easily be viewed as an opportunity to be exploited.

The Bloomberg dashboard  https://www.bloomberg.com/graphics/2020-wuhan-novel-coronavirus-outbreak/   states that of 4515 cases 106 died, 976 were severe, and 60 were discharged. Thus 1142 of the 4515 were hospitalised. That is 25% who are hospitalised if these figures can be believed. So, at the moment between 1000 and 1500 would have needed hospitalisation and some of them would have been discharged or died. In a city of 11m people this is a really small number to have to accomodate so why the huge urgency to build 3 brand new pop-up hospitals from scratch in a week. That seems crazy....totally disproportionate. Are we dealing with 2 different viruses here, a local more deadly one and a milder export one? Is there ANY independent confirmation that anyone has died in mainland China as yet? It is certainly true that no-one outside of mainland China has died or is even critical.

snippet.textDisplay:
there's a lot of anti-china misinformation against china i see hourly as i watch China's CGTN/CCTV youtube/websites a lot, where China has been open about the seriousness of the emerging novel coronavirus, like on last weekend's number of 2566 (2655?!) cases (then, why do you under-misquote it as only 2000 (2070?!); who is giving that outdated information to you!).

whenever i see the China videos BY China itself, i see inconsistent trolling attacks as if China is "making it up" as Fake News, then i see them turnaround about face saying, "oh China knew last year in December, but hid it" (even though only recently last week, that people with NO symptoms can be infected or contaminated, and easily spread it unknowingly!!!).

in the west, people mock the Chinese and many east asian countries for wearing face masks YEAR ROUND in public, not realizing it is a "cultural etiquette" for minimizing spread of respiratory illnesses to others if one is down with any "cold", and others would think a sick person was rude for not wearing a mask. but during seasons of heightened risk of spreading colds, even the healthy all wear masks, too.

however, HERE, out in the west, anyone sick with the cold or flu often goes out anyway, even to school, and WORK, because the workplace doesn't consider it "really sick"! plus those who are sick, never wear face masks to minimize infecting others! and when they sneeze or cough, they just aim "anywhere in the air" !!! (which is disgustingly IGNORANT and INCONSIDERATE!)

it took SARS from the LAST PANDEMIC, for the "some" in the WEST learn to "sneeze into one's nook of one's elbow" or into one's outer jacket to avoid "spraying the shared air"; and even to learn to WASH one's hands after any iffy contact with surfaces where germs persist! plus, to finally wear a face mask out of "courtesy to others" if one absolutely needed to go out from the home, and in fact to decide to stay at home to recover, and not go to school or work. LIKEWISE, to not visit hospitals or the doctors office if one KNOWS one has an "ordinary flu" (which typically has no vaccine). only bacterial and fungal infections can be treated with anti-bacterials and anti-fungals. anti-virals are relatively NEW, about 20 or so years (since understanding AIDS/HIV epidemic), which everyone knows why "flu vaccine" emerged "annually" in the last 2 decades since. UNFORTUNATELY, the dilemma of "flu vaccine" is it is reformulated for "existing viral strains" BUT impossible to tackle "new viral strains" (think about the fact viruses are always EVERCHANGING = Normal anyway!)

The fact that viruses change so naturally and quickly, tells us totally harmless strains could at anytime change by CHANCE ANYWHERE into a deadly form, then SUDDENLY change into yet a milder or harmless version!!! This means it can EMERGE UNEXPECTEDLY "mild snd a nuisance" or also "extremely bad, but not deadly", or worst of all "deadly as deadly can be".

so, anyone who seeks to criticize China, out of ignorance, has to realize "any nation" can face similar low visibility of a "surprise" deadlier viral variant emerging "suddenly" during its unseen "symptomless" less obvious changes.

while China was serious about the "novel coronavirus" for weeks, the rest of the world either downplayed it, or it turned around and made it look like China didn't warn the world (which China DID, but the World ignored China!!! including UN+WHO!!!)

i have seen so much anti-china trolling, that i'm NOT surprised the twisted inaccurate "lack of data" you have has been thoroughly manipulated umpteen times before you realize China was seriously sharing it ALL ALONG "unfiltered"!!!

outsiders have no idea how large Chinese populations really are, where 11 million is really a "small" city, because larger ones are 18 to 26 million. each province can easily be 100+ million (more than most countries!!!) and some 160 to 220 million!!!

try "managing" human behaviour on that scale!
right now i must deal with my aging mom (in Canada) where she's stubborn thinking "she knows better" and rejects good advice = try multiplying that by 300-400 million elderly who don't really know better!
or try managing hundreds of millions of "westerners" who go out sick, further infecting others, when they should recover at HOME!!! (same dilemma!)

until you SEE how hostile anti-china trolls attacking China's media, you have no idea how the information you get via "mainstream media" has been tainted and morphed beyond recognition by the time you get it fed to you "already wrong anyway".

Hi Chris, im from china, and im trying to explain what is happening now. The wuhan city and other cities are under lock down. However, people are on their chinese spring festival vacation, usually 7 days. The chinese government are now extended it for 2 more days, and all local government might extend it further, which means in mean time most people around are china can stay where you are. I'm from Xi'an, Shaanxi Province, theres not much people on the street even cars. Shopping malls and restruant are mostly close, tour places shut down.
We are hoping during this time to get as much sick people from Wuhan as possible and put them on quarantine. Because most cases found in China has direct connection between sick people from Wuhan. So from my understanding we are now dealing with mostly with people from Wuhan or infected by wuhan people. But when the holiday is over people getting back to where they use to work then there might a second outbreak. and this time we dont know who to target. because now people might get infected by anyone.
in the end we hope to get this thing under control, so in the mean time, its critical

snippet.textDisplay: 49 cured? I think you mean recovered. Saliva - half virus particles by weight? Your science is woefully explained. WTF. That aside, you have clearly never been to a Chinese hospital nor do you know how their medical system is structured. I do and your ignorance is stupendous. The building of two new hospitals using prefabrication is something that the Chinese learned from the SARS outbreak some years ago. The sealing of cities and towns near Wuhan (and villages) has mainly been done by local people to stop the infection coming in - not people leaving. Your photos are showing non-damage to roads and is done by locals themselves - only the government has cut roads (they have actually removed sections and replaced them by pits which cars can't drive around). Try to get better informed before you spread misinformation and speculation in future.
